main event: A possible illuminated airborne object was observed southeast of Buckley, Illinois, at approximately 2130 CST.
interesting points: The observer was alerted by a bright light in the sky., The object was described as round with a diameter of approximately 100 to 150 feet., The object moved rapidly in a north to south direction before accelerating vertically., The observation lasted for approximately one minute., No sound was heard during the sighting.
witness description: 50-year-old male resident employed as a farmer, considered reliable and credible.
